description:
One shirt for pre-work runs and weekend hikes. Light and recycled, the Elevation tee keeps you cool while working hard.

  • Fabric composition: solid 150D 146 gsm 100% recycled polyester jersey knit with FlashDry™, heathers 150D 139 gsm 50% recycled polyester and 50% polyester jersey knit with FlashDry™
  • FlashDry™ improves wicking and further reduces drying times
  • Circular design product life cycle, made from recycled materials and recyclable at the end of its life
  • Regular fit wears like an old favourite
name: The North Face Elevation Short Sleeve - Women's

value: 2 or more fabrics; see description2 or more fabrics; see description
